text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Geldrop-Mierlo | settlement_type = Municipality | image_skyline = Centrum Geldrop P1060754.JPG | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = Geldrop-Mierlo vlag.svg | flag_size = 100x67px | flag_alt = | image_shield = Geldrop-Mierlo wapen.svg | shield_size = 100x80px | shield_alt = | image_map = Map - NL - Municipality code 1771 (2009).svg | map_alt = Highlighted position of Geldrop-Mierlo in a municipal map of North Brabant | map_caption = Location in North Brabant | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Province | subdivision_name1 = | established_title = Established | established_date = 1 January 2004 | government_footnotes = | governing_body = Municipal council | leader_party = VVD | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Jos van Bree | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 19 | elevation_max_footnotes = | elevation_max_m = | elevation_min_footnotes = | elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = | population_demonym = | timezone = CET | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = CEST | utc_offset_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = Postcode | postal_code = 5660–5667, 5730–5731 | area_code_type = Area code | area_code = 040, 0492 | website = | footnotes = }} Geldrop-Mierlo is a municipality in the Dutch province of North Brabant. In 2019, 39,595 people lived there. It was created on 1 January 2004 from the former municipalities of Geldrop and Mierlo. == References == Category:2000s establishments in the Netherlands Category:2004 establishments in Europe Category:Municipalities of North Brabant
title: Geldrop-Mierlo
